title: 4 Bedroom Flat
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Pleased to present this first floor 4 bedroom flat located in Edmonton.

This flat offers a three piece family bathroom, good size kitchen with integrated electric cooker, 3 double and one single bedroom.
This bright & airy flat is located close to Edmonton Green railway station & Edmonton Green shopping centre.

To arrange a viewing please give us a call 07706125612
